articles.author: Erin Blakemore
articles.title: Cholera resurgence hampers progress in South and East Africa, study finds - The Washington Post
articles.description: Outbreaks have risen worldwide in recent years.
articles.content:
Southern and eastern African countries are facing a resurgence of cholera, threatening worldwide progress toward eliminating the disease, a recent analysis warns.
